subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Qualifying for the Nascar All-Star race in Concord, N.C., was rained out, giving Kurt Busch the pole based on the qualifying draw.
snippet: Qualifying for the Nascar All-Star race in Concord, N.C., was rained out, giving Kurt Busch the pole based on the qualifying draw.
